item.title: Deezer makes it easier for rival platforms to take a stance against AI-generated music

item.title: Meta burned $19 billion on VR last year, and 2026 wonâ€™t be any better
item.description: The reported financial losses follow a series of layoffs at the VR unit.

item.title: Zuckerberg teases agentic commerce tools and major AI rollout in 2026
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg says 2026 will be "a big year for delivering personal super intelligence."

item.title: Trump energy department loosens rules on nuclear safety
item.description: The new rules apply to nuclear reactors built on Department of Energy property, which includes several currently being developed by startups.

item.title: Microsoft gained $7.6B from OpenAI last quarter
item.description: Microsoft, one of OpenAI's major investors, is benefiting greatly from the AI lab's growth.
